articles.title: Congress demands special session of Maharashtra legislature to address rain cris
articles.summary: Congress Legislature Party (CLP) leader Vijay Wadettiwar on Monday (September 29, 2025) demanded that a special session of the Maharashtra legislature be convened immediately to discuss the flood situation and extensive damage caused by heavy rains in the State . articles.title: Bangkok Post - Greenpeace highlights injustice at Bangkok Climate Action Week
articles.summary: Bangkok Climate Action Week continues with its ambitious programme that brings nonprofits, community leaders, experts, artists, activists, policymakers and the public together to showcase and co-create meaningful climate solutions across the city, until Saturday. Featured in the diverse line-up of events that seek to inspire, educate and moblise urgent climate action are activities on climate justice presented by Greenpeace Thailand at Benjakitti

articles.title: 1 Big Reason To Buy Bitcoin Before the End of 2025
articles.summary: For the year, Bitcoin ( BTC 2.43% ) is only up 20%. However, Bitcoin historically performs best in the final quarter of the year. In 3 of the past 12 years, Bitcoin has more than doubled in value in Q4. And that means Bitcoin -- currently trading around the $112,000 mark -- legitimately has a chance of breaking through the $200,000 price level in 2025. Obviously, a lot has to go right for Bitcoin for this to happen. But several key catalysts are

articles.title: Kenya : 13 Killed in Gilgil Crash , 2 Children Among Passengers Seriously Injure
articles.summary: Nakuru â€” Thirteen people died on Sunday afternoon in a grisly road accident near Kikopey, Gilgil, along the Nakuru-Nairobi highway. Nakuru County Police Commander Emmanuel Opuru said the victims were travelling in a 14-seater PSV headed to Nakuru when it collided head-on with a semi-trailer truck.
